select i.dong, i.roadName, i.apartmentName, i.lat, i.lng, i.dongCode, d.floor, d.area, d.dealAmount, d.no from houseinfo as i inner join housedeal as d on i.aptCode = d.aptCode where i.dongCode = (select dongCode from dongcode where sidoname = #{sidoName} and gugunName = #{gugunName} and dongName = #{dong}) and d.dealYear = #{year} and d.dealMonth = #{month}
